entry.title: DNS seeds returning gone peers
entry.summary: The conversation seems to be discussing the limited number of slots and whether the current settings are too conservative. The seed returns quite a few IPs that don't respond to ICMP pings, and the speaker proceeds to test them using a script that runs ping on each IP. The results show that several IPs have 100% packet loss, while others have a 0% packet loss. An HTML attachment is also mentioned but no further details are provided.
